text: Lillian Grace Woods (born 9 April 1998) is a British actress who appeared in the film Nanny McPhee and the Big Bang as Megsie Green. Woods' other film credits include Blessed (2008), Disco (2010) and Baby (2014). She attended Ysgol Bro Ddyfi, a school in Machynlleth, and now lives in London. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Title !! Role !! Notes !!
